Package com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.music

Class PlayList

java.lang.Object
com.code_connoisseure.space_invaders.music.PlayList
public class PlayList
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a music playlist of variable length that also integrates a shuffle play functionality
Author:
Yannic Wehner

      public PlayList​(com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music track)
      Parameters:
      track - A track that should be added to the newly created playlist.

      public PlayList​(java.util.ArrayList<com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music> playList)
      Parameters:
      playList - An array list containing the music to which the playlist should be initialized to.

  • Method Details

    • addTrack

      public boolean addTrack​(com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music track)
      Adds a new track to the playlist.
      Parameters:
      track - The new track that should be added.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the track was successfully added.

    • removeTrack

      public boolean removeTrack​(com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music track)
      Removes a given track from the playlist.
      Parameters:
      track - The track that should be removed.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the track was removed successfully.

    • play

      public boolean play()
      Starts playing the currently selected track.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the track was started successfully.

    • stop

      public boolean stop()
      Stops playing the currently selected track.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the track was stopped successfully.

    • next

      public boolean next()
      Skips to the next track.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the track could be skipped.

    • previous

      public boolean previous()
      Skips to the previous track.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the track could be skipped.

    • isPlaying

      public boolean isPlaying()
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the playlist is playing at the moment.

    • setCurrentTrack

      public boolean setCurrentTrack​(int newTrack)
      Sets the current track to the given index and starts playing it.
      Parameters:
      newTrack - The index of the new track to play
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the track could be played successfully.

    • shufflePlay

      public boolean shufflePlay()
      Starts shuffle playing the playlist.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the playlist could be shuffle played.

    • stopShufflePlay

      public boolean stopShufflePlay()
      Stops shuffle play.
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not the shuffle play could be stopped.

    • update

      public void update​(float delta)
      Updates the playlist.
      Parameters:
      delta - Provided by mini2Dx. The time span between the current frame and the last frame in seconds. Might be smoothed over n frames.

    • getTrackCount

      public int getTrackCount()
      Returns:
      Returns the track count of the playlist.
